PersonalStatement.text: John Moses, born on 1975-03-13, is a Female based in Lopezstad, Kiribati. She is Divorced and holds British nationality. Currently working at Burton Ltd.

WorkExperience.text: HR Manager at Warren-Wade from 2014 to 2018.
Senior HR Manager at Burton Ltd, 2021 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from Voronezh State University
Master's in Engineering from ETH Zurich - Swiss Federal Institute of Technology

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.
Adaptability: Able to quickly learn and implement new technologies.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys woodworking.
